mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie ( movie_id, movie_name, movie_ko_name, movie_grade, movie_story, movie_trailer, movie_show_yn, movie_release_date, movie_director, movie_actor, movie_running_time, movie_production_country ) VALUES ( movie_seq.nextval, #{movie_name}, #{movie_ko_name}, #{movie_grade}, #{movie_story}, #{movie_trailer}, #{movie_show_yn}, #{movie_release_date}, #{movie_director}, #{movie_actor}, #{movie_running_time}, #{movie_production_country} )
mapper.select: select movie_id,movie_name,movie_ko_name,movie_grade,movie_story,movie_trailer,movie_show_yn ,to_char(movie_release_date,'yyyy.mm.dd') as movie_release_date,movie_director,movie_actor,movie_running_time,movie_production_country from movie where movie_id=#{xx}
select b.MOVIE_GENRE_NAME from movie_genre a, movie_genre_code b where a.MOVIE_GENRE_CODE = b.MOVIE_GENRE_CODE AND MOVIE_ID = #{movie_id}
select * from movie order by movie_release_date DESC
